body:
Hey guys!

I was wondering what all the talk is about this thing called team-speak. So, what is this team speak thing? Is it something like skype? Or is it some sort of messaging site? I was just wondering, because I heard a lot of people could talk to each other, during gameplay. Thought it sounded pretty cool!

Thanks guys

Peace
body_tagged:

I was wondering what all the talk is about this thing called team-speak. So, what is this team speak thing? Is it something like skype? Or is it some sort of messaging site? title: Team Speak.. What is it?

replies.body:
Google it? xd
But as for your question, it's like mumble or ventrilo if that helps. Basically it's a program that allows you to talk to other people on a certain server once you connect to it.
It's has voice chat and IM, it's pretty cool. 
http://www.teamspeak.com/ is the official site.
replies.body_tagged:
Google it? xd
But as for your question, it's like mumble or ventrilo if that helps. Basically it's a program that allows you to talk to other people on a certain server once you connect to it.
It's has voice chat and IM, it's pretty cool. 
http://www.teamspeak.com/ is the official site.

replies.body:
Teamspeak is an application used to talk with other people who are normally on a team with you. Most of the time, you talk rather than type in chat like IRC.

It's sort of like a large Skype call.
replies.body_tagged:
Teamspeak is an application used to talk with other people who are normally on a team with you. Most of the time, you talk rather than type in chat like IRC.

It's sort of like a large Skype call.

replies.body: Is there a certain version I should get? On products, it says there are like 2 or 3 different "team speak's." Oh and does it take up a lot of data???
replies.body_tagged: Is there a certain version I should get? On products, it says there are like 2 or 3 different "team speak's." Oh and does it take up a lot of data???

replies.body:
This post should help you. > Here <
But as other have said it is just like Skype you can only voice chat in groups.

replies.body: Program is called "Teamspeak3" and it shouldn't take up a lot of data.

replies.body:
Ah, well it's a computer application primarily.
If you want it for mobile it'll cost money; I personally don't think that's worth it.

replies.body: Teamspeak isn't similar to Skype, it's actually a program that as long as you introduce an IP, in this case, ts.avicus.net, it'll take you to a couple of rooms where you can talk with the people from this awesome community.

replies.body:
teamspeak is pretty much the greatest thing ever invented

if you come on relatively frequently you'll enjoy yourself guranteed
